flawed_nl_solution:
Deshaun read 19200 pages because 60 x 320 = <<60*320=19200>>19200
The person closest to him read 14400 pages because 19200 x 0.75 = <<14400=14400>>14400
They read 810 pages a day because 14400 / 80 = <<14400/80=810>>810
#### 810

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 180, not 810. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
